    BaseFightAction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CyberBlade, MachineGun, PlasmaGun, RocketLauncher, Thor

    public abstract class TwoOptionalEffectWeapon
extends OneOptionalEffectWeapon
    Abstract class for teh weapons with three alternative effects
    Author:
    Federico Innocente

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        colour - is the colour of the weapon
        name - is the name of the weapon
        reloadCost - is the reload cost
        secondEffectCost - is the cost of the second effect
        thirdEffectCost - is the cost of the third effect

    • Method Detail

      • effectControlFlow

        public void effectControlFlow(int effectUsed)
        Manage the flow of the effects after using one, setting the once that are usable or less. Some effects are only usable before or after other specific effects.
        Overrides:
        effectControlFlow in class OneOptionalEffectWeapon
        Parameters:
        effectUsed - is the last effect used

      • isUsableEffectThree

        public boolean isUsableEffectThree()
        Check if the third effect is usable in the current condition. That means that teh effect must be enabled, the player can pay for it and that it has targets in range.
        Returns:
        true if the effect can be performed, false otherwise

      • getTargetEffectThree

        public abstract ControllerViewEvent getTargetEffectThree()
        Calculate all the possible targets of the third effect (which could be squares or players) and encode them into a message ready to be send to the player .
        Returns:
        a message with all teh information about teh possible targets

      • performEffectThree

        public abstract void performEffectThree(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> targets)
        Perform the third effect of the weapon
        Parameters:
        targets - are the targets chosen by the player

      • performEffect

        public void performEffect(int selectedEffect,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.Object> targets)
        Method called to perform an effect. It can preform only an effect that is enabled for that weapon, otherwise throw an exception
        Overrides:
        performEffect in class TwoEffectWeapon
        Parameters:
        selectedEffect - is the selected effect
        targets - are the targets of the effect, that could be character o square alternatively (depends of the effect)

      • getTargetEffect

        public ControllerViewEvent getTargetEffect(int selectedEffect)
        Get all the possible target of the effect, which could be both squares or players, and return a message ready to be send to the clients for the choice. Only effects enabled for the weapons can be requested.
        Overrides:
        getTargetEffect in class TwoEffectWeapon
        Parameters:
        selectedEffect - is the effect which targets are requested
        Returns:
        a message with the information about all possible targets of the effetc

      • isUsableEffect

        public boolean isUsableEffect(int selectedEffect)
        Check if an effect can be correctly used. That means that teh effect must be enabled, the player can pay for it and that it has targets in range. Only enabled effects can be checked
        Overrides:
        isUsableEffect in class TwoEffectWeapon
        Parameters:
        selectedEffect - is the selected effect
        Returns:
        true if the effect is usable, false otherwise

      • getEffectCost

        public AmmoCube[] getEffectCost(int effect)
        Get the cost of an effect. Only enabled effect can have a cost
        Overrides:
        getEffectCost in class TwoEffectWeapon
        Parameters:
        effect - is the effect which cost is searched
        Returns:
        the cost of the effect

      • hasToPay

        public boolean hasToPay(int effect)
        Check if an effect has to be payed or less. That's because some effects can be performed on more steps, but has to payed ust once
        Overrides:
        hasToPay in class TwoEffectWeapon
        Parameters:
        effect - is the checked effect
        Returns:
        true if the effect has to be payed, false otherwise
